GROUNDBREAKING.Definition: very important because of using new methods, or achieving new results

OTHERWISE.Definition: in a different state or situation

MAMMAL.Definition: animal that gives birth to babies rather than laying eggs, and feeds its young with milk

DEMONSTRABLY.Definition: in a way that can be proved

SPIKEY.Definition: covered with sharp points like needles

EMBRYO.Definition: a person or animal in the early stages of growth within the womb or belly of its mother

TWINNING.Definition: separating their cells to form an additional identical individual

CLONE.Definition: create an exact copy of the animal in a laboratory

TO FULL TERM.Definition: during a pregnancy that lasted for the normal length of time

INCIDENTALLY.Definition: by the way, speaking of which

SPECIALISED.Definition: developed to achieve a particular goal

FULFIL.Definition: do what is required or expected for that

EMBRYONIC.Definition: relating to a person or animal in the early stages of growth within the womb or belly of its mother

STEM CELLS.Definition: cells taken from a person or animal in a very early stage of development

TEST TUBE.Definition: a glass tube used in scientific experiments

UNFERTILISED.Definition: not able to create a baby

SURROGATE.Definition: having the role of the mother

MOVE ON.Definition: go on to a different subject

THEORETICALLY.Definition: according to theory rather than experience or practice

UNTHINKABLE.Definition: so unlikely, that it could not be imagined as possible

CRITICISED.Definition: expressed his disapproval of or objection to it

BAN.Definition: act to make it illegal, prohibition

DENOUNCING.Definition: publicly saying that it was wrong

DISAGREEMENT.Definition: argument, a situation in which people have different opinions

INADVISABLE.Definition: likely to have unwanted, bad consequences, not wise

AWKWARD.Definition: difficult to answer or deal with

VALUABLE.Definition: important and worth a lot of money

EXTINCTION.Definition: the fact of not existing any more as a species

MAMMOTHS.Definition: very large elephants that lived during the Ice Age

ENDANGERED.Definition: in danger of being lost as a species

FERRET.Definition: a small animal with long body used for catching rabbits

HANDLERS.Definition: the people in charge of her

UNCONSCIOUS.Definition: in the state of not being awake
